languages.text: "...и это достаточное наказание для моих братьев, нарушивших законы Комморры". {n}Голос Маражая сочится ленивым презрением.{/n} "Разве не моя сестра переступила запрет, собрав в нашей обители провидцев, обладающих колдовским даром? Не она ли покровительствовала гемункулу, решившему ставить эксперименты с существами, владеющими псайкерскими силами? При чем здесь я, Караэль? Найди другой объект для твоих обвинений".

"...and that is punishment enough for my kin who broke the laws of Commorragh." {n}Marazhai's voice oozes lazy malevolence.{/n} "Was it not my sister who flouted the ban by gathering Farseers with the gift of sorcery in our abode? Was it not she who patronised the Haemonculus who was experimenting on creatures with psyker powers? What does that have to do with me, Kharael? Fling your accusations at a different target if you want them to stick."
languages.original_text: "...и это достаточное наказание для моих братьев, нарушивших законы Комморры". {n}Голос Маражая сочится ленивым презрением.{/n} "Разве не моя сестра переступила запрет, собрав в нашей обители провидцев, обладающих колдовским даром? Не она ли покровительствовала гемункулу, решившему ставить эксперименты с существами, владеющими псайкерскими силами? При чем здесь я, Караэль? Найди другой объект для твоих обвинений".

traits.locale_text: "...and that is punishment enough for my kinsmen who broke the laws of Commorragh." {n}Marazhai's voice oozes with lazy malevolence.{/n} "Was it not my sister who overstepped the ban by gathering seers with the gift of sorcery in our abode? Was it not she who patronized the haemonculus who decided to experiment on the creatures with psyker powers? What does it have to do with me, Kharael? Fling your accusations at a different target if you want them to stick."

languages.text: "... und das ist Strafe genug für meine Verwandten, die gegen die Gesetze von Commorragh verstoßen haben." {n}Marazhais Stimme trieft vor träger Boshaftigkeit.{/n} "War es denn nicht meine Schwester, die gegen das Verbot verstoßen hat, indem sie in unserer Heimat Runenpropheten mit der Gabe der Hexerei versammelt hat? War sie es nicht, die den Haemonculus gefördert hat, der Experimente an Kreaturen mit psionischen Kräften durchgeführt hat? Was hat das mit mir zu tun, Kharael? Schleudert Eure Vorwürfe auf ein anderes Ziel, wenn Ihr wollt, dass sie hängenbleiben."
languages.original_text: "...and that is punishment enough for my kin who broke the laws of Commorragh." {n}Marazhai's voice oozes lazy malevolence.{/n} "Was it not my sister who flouted the ban by gathering Farseers with the gift of sorcery in our abode? Was it not she who patronised the Haemonculus who was experimenting on creatures with psyker powers? What does that have to do with me, Kharael? Fling your accusations at a different target if you want them to stick."

traits.locale_text: "... und das ist Strafe genug für meine Verwandten, die gegen die Gesetze von Commorragh verstoßen haben." {n}Marazhais Stimme trieft vor träger Boshaftigkeit.{/n} "War es denn nicht meine Schwester, die gegen das Verbot verstoßen hat, indem sie in unserer Heimat Runenpropheten mit der Gabe der Hexerei versammelt hat? War sie es nicht, die den Haemonculus gefördert hat, der Experimente an Kreaturen mit psionischen Kräften durchgeführt hat? Was hat das mit mir zu tun, Kharael? Schleudert Eure Vorwürfe auf ein anderes Ziel, wenn Ihr wollt, dass sie hängenbleiben."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “……对那些触犯了科摩罗法律的族人来说，这样的惩罚刚刚好。”{n}玛拉斋的声音中流露着懒散的恶意。{/n}“难道不是我的姐姐藐视禁令，在我们的住所中关押拥有巫术之力的先知吗？难道不是她赞助了血伶人，允许他在拥有灵能力量的生物身上做实验吗？这件事情和我有什么关系，卡瑞尔？如果你打算提出确凿无疑的指控，那你恐怕是找错了人。”
languages.original_text: "...and that is punishment enough for my kin who broke the laws of Commorragh." {n}Marazhai's voice oozes lazy malevolence.{/n} "Was it not my sister who flouted the ban by gathering Farseers with the gift of sorcery in our abode? Was it not she who patronised the Haemonculus who was experimenting on creatures with psyker powers? What does that have to do with me, Kharael? Fling your accusations at a different target if you want them to stick."

traits.locale_text: “……对那些触犯了科摩罗法律的族人来说，这样的惩罚刚刚好。”{n}玛拉斋的声音中流露着懒散的恶意。{/n}“难道不是我的妹妹藐视禁令，在我们的住所中关押拥有巫术之力的先知吗？难道不是她赞助了血伶人，允许他在拥有灵能力量的生物身上做实验吗？这件事情和我有什么关系，卡瑞尔？如果你打算提出确凿无疑的指控，那你恐怕是找错了人。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « ... et c'est une punition suffisante pour mon peuple qui a enfreint les lois de Commorragh. » {n}La voix de Marazhai dégouline d'une malveillance indolente.{/n} « N'est-ce pas ma sœur qui a bafoué l'interdiction en rassemblant sous notre toit les Grands Prophètes maîtrisant la sorcellerie ? Ne finançait-elle pas l'Hémoncule qui expérimentait sur des créatures dotées de pouvoirs de psyker ? Quel rapport avec moi, Kharael ? Trouvez-vous donc quelqu'un de plus crédible à accuser. »
languages.original_text: "...and that is punishment enough for my kin who broke the laws of Commorragh." {n}Marazhai's voice oozes lazy malevolence.{/n} "Was it not my sister who flouted the ban by gathering Farseers with the gift of sorcery in our abode? Was it not she who patronised the Haemonculus who was experimenting on creatures with psyker powers? What does that have to do with me, Kharael? Fling your accusations at a different target if you want them to stick."

traits.locale_text: « ... et c'est une punition suffisante pour mon peuple qui a enfreint les lois de Commorragh. » {n}La voix de Marazhai dégouline d'une malveillance indolente.{/n} « N'est-ce pas ma sœur qui a bafoué l'interdiction en rassemblant sous notre toit les Grands Prophètes maîtrisant la sorcellerie ? Ne finançait-elle pas l'Hémoncule qui expérimentait sur des créatures dotées de pouvoirs de psyker ? Quel rapport avec moi, Kharael ? Trouvez-vous donc quelqu'un de plus crédible à accuser. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «... y eso es suficiente castigo para mi pariente, que rompió las leyes de Commorragh». {n}La voz de Marazhai desprende una maldad perezosa.{/n} «¿Acaso no fue mi hermana la que se saltó la prohibición y reunió videntes que poseen el don de la hechicería en nuestra morada? ¿No fue ella la que acudió al Hemónculo que experimentaba con criaturas con poderes psíquicos? ¿Eso qué tiene que ver conmigo, Kharael? Si quieres que tus acusaciones sirvan, dirígelas contra el objetivo adecuado».
languages.original_text: "...and that is punishment enough for my kin who broke the laws of Commorragh." {n}Marazhai's voice oozes lazy malevolence.{/n} "Was it not my sister who flouted the ban by gathering Farseers with the gift of sorcery in our abode? Was it not she who patronised the Haemonculus who was experimenting on creatures with psyker powers? What does that have to do with me, Kharael? Fling your accusations at a different target if you want them to stick."

traits.locale_text: «... y eso es suficiente castigo para mi pariente, que rompió las leyes de Commorragh». {n}La voz de Marazhai desprende una maldad perezosa.{/n} «¿Acaso no fue mi hermana la que se saltó la prohibición y reunió videntes que poseen el don de la hechicería en nuestra morada? ¿No fue ella la que acudió al Hemónculo que experimentaba con criaturas con poderes psíquicos? ¿Eso qué tiene que ver conmigo, Kharael? Si quieres que tus acusaciones sirvan, dirígelas contra el objetivo adecuado».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「…コモラフの法を破った同族に与えるには十分な罰だ」{n}マラズハイの声には気だるそうな悪意が滲んでいる。{/n}「住処に魔術を持つ先見司を集めてトラック妨害したのは俺の姉じゃないよな？異能者の力で生物実験をしていたハモンキュラスと取引していたのも違うよな？俺となんの関係があるんだ、カラエル？奴らを足止めしたいなら別の奴にお前の言い分をぶつけるんだな」
languages.original_text: "...and that is punishment enough for my kin who broke the laws of Commorragh." {n}Marazhai's voice oozes lazy malevolence.{/n} "Was it not my sister who flouted the ban by gathering Farseers with the gift of sorcery in our abode? Was it not she who patronised the Haemonculus who was experimenting on creatures with psyker powers? What does that have to do with me, Kharael? Fling your accusations at a different target if you want them to stick."

traits.locale_text: 「…コモラフの法を破った同族に与えるには十分な罰だ」{n}マラズハイの声には気だるそうな悪意が滲んでいる。{/n}「住処に魔術を持つ先見司を集めてトラック妨害したのは俺の姉じゃないよな？異能者の力で生物実験をしていたハモンキュラスと取引していたのも違うよな？俺となんの関係があるんだ、カラエル？奴らを足止めしたいなら別の奴にお前の言い分をぶつけるんだな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Commorragh kanunlarını ihlal eden soydaşlarıma layık bir ceza." {n}Marazhai'ın sesi, tembel bir kötülükle dolu.{/n} "Sahirlik yeteneğine sahip Ötesezenleri evimizde toplayarak yasakları ayaklar altına alan ablam değil miydi? Yaratıkların üzerinde ruhsezer güçleriyle deneyler yapan Haimonkulus'un efendisi o değil miydi? Bunların benimle ne ilgisi var Kharael? Suçlamalarının bir anlamı olsun istiyorsan onları başkasına yönelteceksin."
languages.original_text: "...and that is punishment enough for my kin who broke the laws of Commorragh." {n}Marazhai's voice oozes lazy malevolence.{/n} "Was it not my sister who flouted the ban by gathering Farseers with the gift of sorcery in our abode? Was it not she who patronised the Haemonculus who was experimenting on creatures with psyker powers? What does that have to do with me, Kharael? Fling your accusations at a different target if you want them to stick."

traits.locale_text: "Commorragh kanunlarını ihlal eden soydaşlarıma layık bir ceza." {n}Marazhai'ın sesi tembel bir kötülükle dolu.{/n} "Sahirlik yeteneğine sahip Ötesezenleri evimizde toplayarak yasakları ayaklar altına alan kişi ablam değil miydi? Yaratıkların üzerinde ruhsezer güçleriyle deneyler yapan Haimonkulus'un efendisi o değil miydi? Bunların benimle ne ilgisi var Kharael? Suçlamalarının hedefini bulmasını istiyorsan, onları başka yere yönelt."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
